name: My 3D Platformer
description:
Gameplay Instruction:

Move with WASD

Use the mouse to rotate the camera

Use the space to jump (double jump is possible)

Introduction:

This is a game demo of a 3D Platformer based on the asset given in the Coursera course: Game Design and Development 4: 3D Platformer. 

Modifications to the original version: 

1) created brand new three levels; 

2) created new gameplay (see level 2); 

3) add a mission system. 

Enjoy :)
